name: RainonLake
0:
”Alexa open Rain on Lake”
”Alexa ask Rain on Lake to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain on lake
des:
Rain on Lake provides the calming sounds of rain falling on the surface of a lake. This skill combines the gentle patter of rain with the subtle movements of water, creating a tranquil and soothing environment ideal for stress relief and relaxation.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Rain on Lake
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
